creator: jhut@inst.strykercorp.com
text:
The JDBCRealm calls commit() on the connection when retrieving roles.  This 
causes a SQLException "Cannot call commit when autocommit=true" when using 
MM.MySQL 2.0.4.  As a workaround I created another realm with the call to commit
() deleted and it works again.

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
Set the connection to non-auto-commit mode when opening, so that the commit()
will operate normally.  Doing both reads in a single transaction causes less 
database overhead on databases that support transactions.
